ing: salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 head cauliflower, broken into small florets
des: "This recipe calls for ingredients found in any grocery store, or that are already in your own kitchen.  Delicious and easy to prepare.  Make as spicy or mild as you want."
ins:
Heat the butter and olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and carrots; cook and stir until tender. Season with curry powder, turmeric, salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes.
Add the cauliflower and potatoes to the pan, and stir to coat with spices. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer for 20 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender. Stir occasionally.
